metadata.name: Golden light
metadata.description:
Golden light

This minimal but intense scene crossed my way on an evening walk. It represents the small, raw moments, that we tend to oversee in our busy everyday life. But they are always there. Even in the dark times there is beauty and peace.

There was no post-editing, except of slight crop - as I love keeping my photography process minimal, too.

Location: Dresden, Germany
Date: March, 2022
Edition: 1/1
